pkgmetadata.longdescription: This Python package is a high-level wrapper for Kerberos (GSSAPI) operations.The goal is to avoid having to build a module that wraps the entire Kerberos.framework,and instead offer a limited set of functions that do what is needed for client/serverKerberos authentication based on <http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4559.txt>.
